title: UTair Aviation Now Partner of Sochi Loyalty and Hospitality ProgramTravelandtourworld.com
text:
UTair Aviation Now Partner of Sochi Loyalty and Hospitality Program Published on : Sunday, August 9, 2015
UTair Aviation has become a partner of the Sochi Resort Administration Loyalty and Hospitality Program. UTair passengers can take advantage of significant discounts for a variety of amenities and purchases at one of the best Black Sea resorts in the country through the special privileged status available to the holders of the “I LOVE SOCHI” card.
The ”I LOVE SOCHI” discount cards are eligible for discounts from 15% to 75% on the purchase of goods and services from the program’s partners. To date, the program has united more than 100 partners that have passed the program’s quality control standards for services. Program partners include hotels, health resorts, SPA centers, shopping malls, a sightseeing company, a taxi provider, cafes and restaurants, as well as popular venues for recreation and entertainment in Sochi.
To access the discounts of the program, travelers need only approach the official “I LOVE SOCHI” stand in the arrival hall of the Sochi International Airport, or trip planners can place an order to purchase a discount card from the official website www.sochigo.com. UTair passengers can receive a 30% discount on the purchase cost of the “I LOVE SOCHI” travel discount card by presenting their UTair Aviation ticket or boarding pass.
“We hope that our passengers will really appreciate this offer,” said UTair – Passenger Airlines President Oleg Semenov. “By becoming members of the program, UTair passengers can save significantly on their travel budget and experience more leisure opportunities. I am confident that the partnership between UTair and the Sochi Resort Administration Loyalty and Hospitality Program will undoubtedly contribute to an increase in domestic travel to Sochi and enhance the attraction of one of the best Black Sea resorts of Russia.”
